mapper.sql: REPORT_NO,ID,NUM, COLOR,DIAMETER_TD1,DIAMETER_TD2, DIAMETER_TD3,DIAMETER_TD4,DIAMETER_TD5, DIAMETER_TD6,INSUL_OD_TD1,INSUL_OD_TD2, INSUL_OD_TD3,INSUL_OD_TD4,INSUL_OD_TD5, INSUL_OD_TD6,INSUL_THK_TD1,INSUL_THK_TD2, INSUL_THK_TD3,INSUL_THK_TD4,INSUL_THK_TD5, INSUL_THK_TD6,INSUL_THK_TD7,INSUL_THK_TD8, INSUL_THK_TD9,INSUL_THK_TD10,INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD1, INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD2,INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD3,INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD4, INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD5,INSUL_UNAGED_ELONGATION_TD6,INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD1, INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD2,INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD3,INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD4, INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD5,INSUL_UNAGED_PULL_TD6,INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD1, INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD2,INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD3,INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD4, INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD5,INSUL_AGING_ELONGATION_TD6,INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD1, INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD2,INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD3,INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD4, INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD5,INSUL_AGING_PULL_TD6,HTG_FRONT_AVG_DIAMETER, HTG_REAR_AVG_DIAMETER,IR_LENGTH,IR_TD,CONDUCTOR20_DCR_TD,MATERIAL_QUALITY, INSUL_MATERIAL_QUALITY,FIRTY807_UNAGED,SECOND807_AGING,INSUL_HTHP

delete from FPR_WIRE where REPORT_NO = #{reportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID IN
